event.title: Public Money Public Code â€“ Modernising Public Infrastructure with Free Software in Utrecht, Netherlands

body.p: The FSFE Policy Manager will give a talk during the "Online Participatie in Actie!" Congress. What is Free Software? Why is it good when administrations rely on Free Software? How does Free Software contribute to security and transparency of state digital infrastructure? Which steps can public administrations take? These and more questions are answered in this talk.
